neurotools.gpu.cu.graph module¶

This module contains utility for performing graph algorithms on the GPU.

Representations of Graph datastructures on GPU :

Sparse Matrix : N nodes, [prologue][data] prologue : N int2 onjects : [offset,neighbors] Data for element i beings at offset, consists of neighbors entries of node indecies.

Adjacency Matrix : row major square matricies integer matrix float matrix

neurotools.gpu.cu.graph.connect_gaussian(n, k, s, p)[source]¶
neurotools.gpu.cu.graph.random_point_sheet(n, d)[source]¶
neurotools.gpu.cu.graph.spherepoints(n, r, k)[source]¶
